TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SharedPersonalizationStateInfo extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo
Public NotInheritable Class SharedPersonalizationStateInfo Inherits PersonalizationStateInfo

Docs.summary: Represents a lightweight version of shared personalization information about a page. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class represents statistical information about the personalization state of a page. It does not return the personalization data (such as property data that is applied or extracted when personalization occurs) itself. This class can be used to determine how many users have saved personalization settings for a page, and the size, in bytes, of that information.

MemberSignature.Value: public SharedPersonalizationStateInfo (string path, DateTime lastUpdatedDate, int size, int sizeOfPersonalizations, int countOfPersonalizations);

Public Sub New (path As String, lastUpdatedDate As DateTime, size As Integer, sizeOfPersonalizations As Integer, countOfPersonalizations As Integer)
public: SharedPersonalizationStateInfo(System::String ^ path, DateTime lastUpdatedDate, int size, int sizeOfPersonalizations, int countOfPersonalizations);
new System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo : string * DateTime * int * int * int -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo

Docs.param: The page that the information applies to. is an application-relative (using tilde syntax) virtual path.
A indicating when the shared information for the page was last updated.
The size, in bytes, of the shared state information for the page.
The total size, in bytes, of all per-user personalization information that exists for the page.
The total number of users who have personalized the page.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `countOfPersonalizations` parameter represents the total number of users who have personalized a page. For example, if 100 users personalize a page, then the value of `countOfPersonalizations` for that page would be 100, not 100 multiplied by the number of personalized properties. Note that this count might or might not match the total number of rows used in the underlying data store to persist per-user information, because some data storage providers use multiple rows to store per-user personalization information for a single user and page combination.
Note that `path` is trimmed if non-null.

Docs.exception: , when trimmed, is an empty string ("").

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the total number of users that have personalized a page.
Docs.value: The total number of per-user personalization settings that have been applied to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property returns the total number of users that have personalized a page. For example, if 100 users personalize a page, then the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo.CountOfPersonalizations%2A> for that page would be 100, not 100 multiplied by the number of personalized properties. Note that this count might or might not match the total number of rows used in the underlying data store to persist per-user information, because some data storage providers use multiple rows to store per-user personalization information for a single user and page combination.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SizeOfPersonalizations As Integer
public: property int SizeOfPersonalizations { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the total size of all per-user personalization information for a page.
Docs.value: The total size, in bytes, of all personalization information for a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property returns the size of all per-user personalization information that exists for a page. This will be a different value than the value returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo.Size%2A> because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SharedPersonalizationStateInfo.SizeOfPersonalizations%2A> is the size in bytes of only the per-user state for a page and does not include the size of shared state data included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo.Size%2A> value.
